name: targetedattacks
description: This is a list of malware and exploit samples involved in targeted attacks against civil society

fields.name: country
fields.description: Country where the attack took place

fields.name: md5
fields.description: Hash of the file related to the attack

fields.name: c2
fields.description: Domain or IP address related to the attack

fields.name: family
fields.description: Name of the malware family related to the attack

fields.name: reference
fields.description: Reports or articles that reference this attack
